string.value: Visit #b#p1102000# the Training Instructor#k and receive some training.

#p1102000#'s fourth session involves facing off against the fourth weakest... you get the drill. Anyway, an easy Mimi called #r#o0100123##k, and defeating #r20#k of them in the process. You better hunt down those #o0100123#s in #b#m130010100##k. \n\n#o0100123##r #a200061##k
You managed to defeat all 15 #o0100122#s and return. Off to the next session.
네 번째 수련은... 이제 말 안 해도 알겠지? 지금 네 레벨이면 딱 사냥하기 좋을 #m0100123#를 잡으면 돼. 이번에는 한 20마리 잡아 보자고.
#m0100123#가 있는 위치... 설명 안 해도 짐작하겠지? 수련의 숲3에서 포탈을 타고 왼쪽으로 나가면 수련의 숲4가 있는데, 그곳에 #m0100123#들이 있어. 자, 그럼 수고해.
벌써 수련이 지겨워진 거야? 이봐이봐. 아직 멀었다고. 기사의 길은 이 정도가 아니라니까.
Your fourth training session will involve... you know what I'm going to give you, right? You are right at that level where you can take on #r#o0100123##k. Let's try #r20#k of them, okay?
I don't even need to tell you where you can find #o0100123#... Right? Find them at or near #b#m130010100##k. Good luck.
Are you already getting sick of training? You can't say that. You're nowhere near the level you should be to even think of something like that.

You must have defeated 20 #o0100123#s. Wow... a little more, and you may be able to become a Knight-in-Training! I advise you to start planning out what kind of a knight you'd like to become. A knight of light, a magician of fire, a bowman of wind, a thief of darkness, or a pirate of lightning... you're surely interested in becoming one of them, right?
But before anything, you must become stronger. Talk to me when you're ready to take the next step.
Were you not able to defeat #r20 #o0100123#s#k yet? You'll find them at #b#m130010100##k or in forests nearby.
